DescriptionData.Title: Barbecue Grill Portable Foldable Household Charcoal Barbecue Tool Enjoy The Beautiful Outdoor Life, Enjoy The Slow Life
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LDLJJ's home, we will take care of each customer's feelings. This type of barbecue can be used outdoors for various purposes such as camping, backpacking, beaches, picnics, cooking, hiking, car tails, etc. It is also suitable for indoor use, such as various parties or family gatherings.

★ Features:
Free installation, light weight, durable, sanitary, etc. Enjoy a healthy barbecue!

★ Specifications:
Material: Stove: Iron
Grill: Stainless steel grill
Applicable number: Small 1-3 people, large 3-6 people

★ Packing content:
1 * Charcoal grill
1 * Bamboo stick
2 * Anti-hot gloves
1 * Aluminum foil
2 * Hair brush
1 * Stainless steel grill / charcoal clip

★ Note:
1. Due to the influence of the display and light, the actual color may be slightly different from the image color.
2. Due to manual measurement, please allow a difference of 0.5-1CM.
3. Place the grill on a stable, flat and non-combustible place.
4. Placing tin foil under the charcoal of the grill can effectively prevent the body from turning black and prolong the life of the grill.
5. Please keep the barbecue out of the reach of children to avoid accidents.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ Super Value：Comes with extra BBQ grill tool sets including Barbecue Tongs, Basting Brush, Tin foil, our barbecue grill provide best barbecue experience for you . no need to wait and waste the tool money.

★ Easy To Assemble：The grill comes with an easy-to-follow instruction that allows for pressure-free assembly without tools, just open it and lower it four feet and fold the legs to use the handle whenever you need it.

★ Portable Charcoal Grill：Different from heavy grill stoves, this grills are made with high quality mental steel to guarantee the durability and longevity. Folding legs design, make it easy to carry, storage and assemble. Charcoal grill, keeps your meat the most original flavor.

★ Perfect For Barbecue：Perfect gift for BBQ, picnics, camping, patio, indoor, outdoor parties, traveling, holiday, park, garden, beach with your friends and families. Enjoy your tasty food Anywhere! Suitable for 3-5 people.
★ The most beautiful service: Welcome to LDLJJ's home. If you have any questions, please contact us first. We will resolve the issue within 24 hours. Hope to bring you the best shopping experience.

DescriptionData.Title: Electric Barbecue Grill Detachable Baking Tray Five-Speed Temperature Control With Oil Box Multifunctional Barbecue Pot
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LDLJJ's home, we will take care of each customer's feelings. This type of barbecue can be used outdoors for various purposes such as camping, backpacking, beaches, picnics, cooking, hiking, car tails, etc. It is also suitable for indoor use, such as various parties or family gatherings.

★ Features:
Lightweight, durable and hygienic. Enjoy a healthy barbecue!

★ Specifications:
Product Model: Large, Medium
Material: High temperature resistant bakelite + stainless steel
Rated power: 1800W
Rated voltage: 220V
Rated frequency: 50HZ
Suitable number: 2-8 people

★ Packing content:
1 × Electric heating grill

★ Note:
1. Due to the influence of the display and light, the actual color may be slightly different from the image color.
2. Due to manual measurement, please allow a difference of 0.5-1CM.
3. Place the grill in a stable, flat and non-combustible place.
4. Put tin foil under the charcoal of the grill can effectively prevent the body from darkening and extend the life of the grill.
5. Do not touch the baking tray during use to avoid being burned by high temperature.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ Unique design: Oil outlet + detachable oil receiving box, allow excess oil to flow directly into the oil receiving box when grilling, avoid dry boiling oil, reduce greasy, and facilitate cleaning.
★ High-quality materials: Non-stick non-stick coating, Maifan stone process, water-based non-stick coating, so that the amount of oil smoke is poor.
★ Easy to clean: The entire body can be washed with water, unplug the power, and rinse directly.
★ 5 levels of temperature control: Worry about health is not easy to burn, with power failure protection, automatic power off when the specified temperature. To eat well, the heat is important.
★ The most beautiful service: Welcome to LDLJJ's home. If you have any questions, please contact us first. We will resolve the issue within 24 hours. Hope to bring you the best shopping experience.
